thread.title: Leading ivory trade investigator found dead in Kenya

title: Leading ivory trade investigator found dead in Kenya
text:
Leading ivory trade investigator found dead in Kenya 4:50pm GMT - 01:18 
A prominent American investigator of the illegal ivory and rhino horn trade has reportedly been found dead in his Nairobi home, just before he was expected to publish a new expose on Asia's influence. Matthew Larotonda reports.   
A prominent American investigator of the illegal ivory and rhino horn trade has reportedly been found dead in his Nairobi home, just before he was expected to publish a new expose on Asia's influence. Matthew Larotonda reports.  //reut.rs/2nJLG0l
